summary: A collection of basic lore-friendly followers.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is a collection of three lore-friendly followers who are scattered throughout Skyrim. Each has their own backstory and combat specialties, and should level up alongside the player.

Marcius - 1h/Shield
Marcius is a Quaestor enrolled in the Imperial legion. He isn't very happy with his current assignments in Skyrim, and wishes he was with the rest of the legion, on the borders of the Aldmeri Dominion, however, he has decided to make the most of his time in Skyrim regardless. (Works best with Civil War imperial questline, can be found at Castle Dour)

Brynhild Wind-Torn - 1h/Shield
Brynhild is a Nordic shieldmaiden who was captured by bandits while escorting a merchant caravan along the roads of Whiterun Hold. For the past months, she has been plotting her escape from her abusive bandit overlords, and would gladly join anyone who brought them to justice.

Llewyn Afenmund - Spellsword
Llewyn is son to a minor nobleman in High Rock. After the destruction of his home village at the hands of a quarreling feudal lord, he has fled to Skyrim, and seeks to gain a reputation and following before he returns home and reclaims what is his.
author: Roelen
